attributes.action: Provide Financial help to parents/Carers of children in receipt of free school meals out of term time.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
During school term my four children receive a free school meal. Fiancially this is very helpful.
But for half the year my children are at home due to school holidays and teacher training. During this time we have NO financial help towards feeding them at all.
Whilst we would love to give them fresh fruit and vegetables during this time it is a struggle just to feed them. Our shopping bill will go up by around 300% and this is simply by just buying the cheap food and BOGOF offers which are usually low on the nutritional side.
The Goverment need to recognize this and give extra assistance out of school time as well as during.
